thumb.name: Hope to Spot You Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3EInvitation Instructions:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E1. To personalize and print this project, click on the preview image to the left to open the workspace.%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E2. Personalize the text and graphics. Select the text to change it or its size, color, and font. Even add digital photos!%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E3. Click on the Print button, select the number of copies you'd like to print and go!. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cb%3ETips:%3C/b%3E Print your card on plain paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E

thumb.name: A Celebration
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA Celebration%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIn honor of%3Cbr%3EJim Harvey!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThree o'clock in the afternoon.%3Cbr%3ESaturday. September 21. 2012.%3Cbr%3Eat The Party Center.%3Cbr%3E401 Randolph Road.%3Cbr%3EMeadow Lake. Wyoming%3Cbr%3ER.S.V.P. to 819-555-4200
